body_html: @xiaoyunwu - Unfortunately, no concrete update yet. However, the intent is to keep this in line with graph execution via the distribution strategy APIs and integrate that with the tf.keras classes so that the same code works for both graph and eager execution.
body_text: @xiaoyunwu - Unfortunately, no concrete update yet. However, the intent is to keep this in line with graph execution via the distribution strategy APIs and integrate that with the tf.keras classes so that the same code works for both graph and eager execution.
body: @xiaoyunwu - Unfortunately, no concrete update yet. However, the intent is to keep this in line with graph execution via the [distribution strategy APIs](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute) and integrate that with the `tf.keras` classes so that the same code works for both graph and eager execution.
